title: Steeley
author: Steeley
created_time: June 09, 2022, 06:39:15 PMLast edit: June 16, 2022, 03:13:14 PM by Steeley
content: Here are the results of the June Stacks Bowers Auction: https://auctions.stacksbowers.com/auctions/3-WWAV2/the-june-2022-auction-session-2-us-coins-part-2-lots-2001-2328?limit=36&parent_category=3-U5GPQCheck out the Satoris?! Whoh----------------------------------------------------------------------Here's another auction featuring physical Bitcoins (link below):I think the interesting development with this auction is that the previous two have been exclusive to PCGS graded Casascius and Lealana coins. This auction does have plenty of PCGS Cas and Lealanas, but also includes Satoris and a BTCC chip. They also have a few item graded by ANACS and IGC. The trend (small sample size obviously) shows an expanding appetite to test the sales water for physical bitcoins. https://www.greysheet.com/news/story/bitcoins-and-physical-cryptocurrency-featured-in-the-stack-s-bowers-galleries-june-2022-auctionSteeley

comments.author: Eclipse33
comments.created_time: June 10, 2022, 02:24:26 AMLast edit: March 19, 2025, 05:05:08 PM by Eclipse33

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Quote from: Eclipse33 on June 10, 2022, 02:24:26 AMInteresting to see a move into lower denominations. Â They probably see it as more revenue on volume and also higher margins.

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: I just checked on the results of this auction. The three single post fork Satoris all went for more than $2000 each. WhohSteeley

comments.author: yimfinity
comments.body: Quote from: Steeley on June 16, 2022, 03:52:20 AMI just checked on the results of this auction. The three single post fork Satoris all went for more than $2000 each. WhohSteeleyAwesome to see. The color/holo set really pop and until fairly recently you could get a whole uncirculated roll for auction on here regularly.

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: Quote from: yimfinity on June 17, 2022, 07:29:41 AMQuote from: Steeley on June 16, 2022, 03:52:20 AMI just checked on the results of this auction. The three single post fork Satoris all went for more than $2000 each. WhohSteeleyAwesome to see. The color/holo set really pop and until fairly recently you could get a whole uncirculated roll for auction on here regularly.Rolls still come up here frequently. This prefork roll just sold for .091 on May 28th ($2640 at the time of sale). https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5399628.0
